website_summaries.verdict: A great price for a 90-day supply and most users are pleased with its effects.
pros: Contains non-GMO ashwagandha and artichoke leaf extract
Users have reported feeling more relaxed, sleeping better and having more energy
cons: Contains the filler magnesium stearate, which some health-conscious consumers may want to avoid

customer_reviews.title: Need help dealing with stress? Get this.
customer_reviews.text: I have severe anxiety, depression, and am being treated with a well known SSRI, but I still have some days where the medication just doesn’t cut it. After reading countless reviews about this brand, I decided to give this herb a go. All I can say is that, wow, I am so excited that I found this. Instead of spending the evening contemplating having another drink to ease myself into relaxation, I just take this as directed and my mood changes. If you deal with loads of stress, this is a spectacular addition to your self-care routine.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra.

customer_reviews.title: Big Difference!
customer_reviews.text: This product made such a difference in my health. I'm 45 and have been struggling with hormone issues and weight gain. After 2 weeks, I felt like my body was coming back to a more neutral state. In addition I feel like my stress levels have decreased and I have more energy. I don't know how I lived without this for so long!
customer_reviews.author: Story

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have been on it for about a week and already feel it working. My anxiety has decreased and I feel as if I can properly take on my daily tasks without feeling rushed. I take it along with neuroIGNITE which is great for focusing. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Jess & Craig

customer_reviews.title: do not trust the reviews for this product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because this herb was recommended on a website, and I saw how many 5 star ratings this particular brand had. When I used it, I personally didn't notice any difference between using it or not. The thing that bothers me is that in the box was a card that said that I could get a free bottle if I would leave a 5 star review on Amazon. This kind of thing makes the whole ratings system on Amazon completely worthless. Maybe I am too trusting to want to believe personal reviews, but it is something that I used to love about Amazon, and it is disappointing to see it's demise.
customer_reviews.author: Steven A. Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Just a normal determined guy
customer_reviews.text: I am one who thinks and thinks and thinks. Able to put myself in a bad mood just through thought and truly believe. Since I began taking Ashwagandha I have seriously just noticed I am more "down to earth". Our thoughts and past "bad" decisions can be a huge factor in how we live the rest of our lives. I know this has helped me tremendously. Thank you Havasu Nutrition. I was curious if I may be eligible or able to talk with Havasu physically over the phone. Again I recommend this very highly. Good luck to all the rest. "Tony"
customer_reviews.author: Anthony D. Wamble

customer_reviews.title: Great for anxiety and stress management
customer_reviews.text: I found this product to be extremely helpful for my anxiety. I especially found relief when trying to relax/calm down after work and before sleep. I would highlight recommend giving this a try to anybody experiencing anxiety or general "stress". I found this product while trying to detox my life from a lot of things including pharmaceuticals and I could not have found it at a better time!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I have anxiety and as a result I also have in neurological disorder (BFS) that causes twitches. In order to minimize the twitching I have to control the anxiety. I try to do all of this with natural and homeopathic remedies. I was very pleased with this product as it makes me feel more calm. I will definitely buy again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Drop Cholesterol & High BP
customer_reviews.text: My first two weeks of Ashwagandha lowered my cholesterol from 216 to 131 -- a drop of 85 points! My doctor was very impressed. I also dropped by high blood pressure from the 150 / 98 range to 118 / 80. Not even the prescription medication I have been taking for 4-5 years has provided results like this. I hope it works for everyone like it has for me!
customer_reviews.author: dj magrone

customer_reviews.title: Bad reaction caused me to miss work.
customer_reviews.text: This made me to sleepy to work, feel spacey ,and gave me diarrhea. I did some more research and the highest recommended dose is 350mg and this is 1000mg!!! I have also now read that if you have stomach issues or you react badly to nightshades you should not take it.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Can't take them, cause digestive issues.
customer_reviews.text: I can't say anything to it's effect on stress/anxiety because these made me very sick to my stomach which was more stressful than my usual physical symptoms I get with my anxiety. I took them for two weeks hoping my body would adjust but at the end of two weeks the acid reflux after taking them was so bad with these that I couldn't take them anymore. Wish they would have worked for me or were gentler on the stomach.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Crystal Clear
customer_reviews.text: As a SAHM to four young children, I need all the help I can get. This product delivers all the Brain protecting, mood lifting support I need! It helps to keep my outlook positive and my mood more consistent. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal G.

customer_reviews.title: Significant improvement in my sleep in two weeks
customer_reviews.text: I've struggled with insomnia for two decades and refuse to take prescription sleep aids. I've used this product for only two weeks and I'm sleeping deeper and longer during the night. No grogginess or brain fog. I'm alert when I wake up. I'm more calm and centered during the day. I feel so much better already and anticipate even greater improvement over the 4 - 8 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Penflair

customer_reviews.title: INCREDIBLY EFFECTIVE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY FANTASTIC AND THE BEST PART IS THAT IT IS NOT A PRESCRIPTION DRUG BUT IT IS A 100% WONDER AGAINST DEPRESSION AND NEGATIVE THINKING!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Thea Quark

customer_reviews.title: ICK
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. The caplets smell horrible, and every time I take one (no ,after how much water I drink) I cough up hard grass-like particles with a disgusting taste. I much prefer Organic India brand. With that said, I will also add that I am not even sure I feel any relief as a result of taking either brand. If there is an effect, it is extremely subtle and must be weighed against the cost and expense of taking a daily supplement
customer_reviews.author: soba525

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: Had a bad experience. Not only did it cause major digestive issues, I had a serious depressive episode. No thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Caryn

customer_reviews.title: Causes acne
customer_reviews.text: I started breaking out on my forehead since taking these and I will not touch these ever again. It doesn’t help me much with anxiety either. It might work for others but if you suddenly started having acne problems, this might be the cause of it. Adult acne is the worst. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon user

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing Difference
customer_reviews.text: This makes life with my husbands Alzheimer’s so much easier. I’m very calm in the worst situations now. This makes both of our lives more fulfilling. It’s just a since of well being I haven’t had in a decade. I’m on my second order.
customer_reviews.author: Niki Harris

customer_reviews.title: its good
customer_reviews.text: I like taking this before bed, it helps me wake up feeling calmer and prepared to take on the everyday stress. Ashwagandha is great for that. I would've given the product 5 stars but the in exchange for a free bottle I had to write a review. I guess that would seem fair to most people, but it rubbed me the wrong way and made me question the validity of the reviews I saw when I first purchased the product. Overall though, good product.
customer_reviews.author: Raysa

customer_reviews.title: Doubtful
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure this is real aswanghanda. It’s an adaptogen. It should calm you down if you’re up, or cool you down if you’re flying. When I was feeling anxious and took it, it seemed to pump me up. Never heard of this brand, got it for the price. Lesson learned. I’ll buy Banyan in the future.
customer_reviews.author: anniebb

customer_reviews.title: Saw no differences.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I didn’t see any difference in my anxiety with these. At first I felt like it was helping some, but by the third day, I came to terms that this wasn’t doing anything. Honestly, it was a better use of my money to go see a doctor and get on a prescription for something that actually manages it. My blood pressure was sky high with these still. Maybe it works for some people. But I saw no difference in me.
customer_reviews.author: Sage

customer_reviews.title: It is a great supplement I did my own research and found that ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a great supplement I did my own research and found that the recommended dose on the botle (which is 2 capsules a day =1000mg) can be way higher so I just take 2 capsules with every meal. I have also m=found that everyone around me is sick with the flu now (I work with patients) and I have NOT CAUGHT it! My energy and positivity are on point and overall this herb helps me think straight on top of its other benefits. Would definitely recommend to anyone really as it has zero side effects and is all natural!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: I think the Artichoke was the culprit for me.
customer_reviews.text: Ashwaganda is part of the nightshade family, so if you have issues with tomatoes, etc. Avoid. I don't have issues with them, however this supplement gave me the worst abdominal bloating, cramps, etc. Almost ER worthy but managed through it. Another supplement (liver cleanse with 10 ingredients) had the same effect. Pure agony. I realized both products had one common ingredient, artichoke extract. I believe this is what caused my stomach distress in both situations. I will try ashwaganda again next time, but without the artichoke. I'm hoping it's not an issue with ashwaganda itself. I hope this review helps.
customer_reviews.author: Ron E

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: These are phenomenal for stress relief and sleep. We have been taking valerian root before bed, but after reading around on Reddit we came across these. Really have a nice calming effect without making you drowsy or crappy side effects from medication. We're already on our second bottle.
customer_reviews.author: RyanG

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: I saw all the reviews and was impressed. I'd just had a baby and was really needing a pick me up and a stress reliever so i took a chance after reading tge reviews and researching other products. Ive been using it for 2 months and this product's effectiveness is unmistakable! It picks up my entire day in both mood and energy. I feel so good. Worth every penny. I might just take it the rest of my life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff
customer_reviews.text: Might be one of the best things I have ever purchased on Amazon. I will be taking this for the rest of my life. I feel like a different person. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Dan Macdonald

customer_reviews.title: Didn't help
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for me. Used it for almost 4 weeks and didn't notice any change
customer_reviews.author: creepsi10

customer_reviews.title: Good price for the Ashwagandha
customer_reviews.text: It is often difficult to tell if a supplement is doing what it is supposed to and I have only been taking this for a short period of time, but feel this is a good price for ashwagandha.
customer_reviews.author: EH

customer_reviews.title: ... only after I ran out did I realize how well it was working!
customer_reviews.text: I started using this product daily as part of my normal vitamins during the stress of this COVID-19 situation. Being a business owner, being shut down, opening under stressful requirements... well its a bit stressful. This last weekend I ran out of Ashwagandha. I forgot to reorder from Amazon right away. I've noticed constant acid reflux this week. At first, I thought it was the food I was eating, but day-to-day it persisted. Then, I realized it must be stress-related. So, I reordered immediately-- I didn't realize how much of a positive effect this supplement was having on my body's ability to handle stress. I definitely believe now. It's worth trying if you have stress affecting your life.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Powell

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I must say, I am so glad I decided to try Premium Ashwagansha from Havasu. I didn't realIze how much it helps until I left the house one day for work forgetting to take it. I felt so stressed out all day it made me realize what a positive effect the ashwagandha has on my anxiety. Thank you for introducing me to a great, natural remedy!
customer_reviews.author: Fran F

customer_reviews.title: Great way to decrease anxiety without the effects of pharmaceutical drugs
customer_reviews.text: I tried this a a few weeks back. At first I was skeptical, thinking that since it is not prescribed it would not provide anxiety relief. I tried it for a few days and after the third day, I saw the difference. No high, no lows, no weird body sensations that you would feel with prescribed medication. Just a sense of calmness and the ability to continue to work. I don't have severe anxiety, i just have occasional stressors in life that I would like some help with, without physician intervention and taking mediaction with multiple secondary effects. I highly recommend it, actually buying another one for my mother.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco J Orozco

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using this product for 2 weeks. I have noticed a difference. I have more energy during the day and don't feel as stressed as I did before. My stress was really high. Can't wait to see the results after I have been using the product longer. Will update my post after that time.
customer_reviews.author: paula

customer_reviews.title: Ashwagandha is a must & HAVASU is the best!
customer_reviews.text: I have used Ashwagandha for years. I used a different brand, long ago, but this one is, by far, my FAVORITE! Just call me a HAVASU repeat customer. It is made in the USA and includes artichoke in the supplement (for liver, digest, blood pressure and sugar support). I also prefer capsules, opposed to pressed pills. Some people take their Ashwagandha in the morning for their ‘impending’ stressful day (a good thing), but I prefer my Ashwagandah at night, for a good restful sleep. I once heard a doctor say, ‘I would not go a day without my Ashwagandah.’ If you support your body and diet with healthful herbs and supplements, you need this one!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Mae

customer_reviews.title: Chill pill for sure
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend which has high blood pressure and stresses out about things. He loves it... it takes time to kick in, like 2 weeks and u don't feel any different according to him. I noticed that he doesn't stress out and is super mellow about things which is not like him at all. He's been taking them for 2 and half months now.. so i say yesssss to these pills.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made me violently sick
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try this product. It may work, but unfortunately 3 hours after taking it I became violently sick to my stomach. I always take new products at night because if it mildly upsets my stomach I sleep through it. Unfortunately, I woke up thinking I had the stomach flu it was so bad. After an hour of getting sick, it was out of my system and I was fine the next day. Just be warned if you have a sensitive stomach, even the normal dose can make you very sick.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Anders

customer_reviews.title: Give it a little time. It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that the first week of taking this I was quite skeptical. I didn't notice any changes, I almost felt as though I was more sensitive and not in a good way. But after that week I started noticing a change. My mood was better and I wasn't as stressed out as I've normally been. Even if there wasn't an offer of a free bottle I would still repurchase because I know that I haven't been taking Ashwagandha long enough to experience it's full potential. I really do like this product and will continue to use for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: gretchen w

customer_reviews.title: Helped with anxiety, but left me feeling hungover
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking these to help take the edge off my anxiety. It has helped me feel more calm and relaxed, and I've been sleeping great. But I've also been struggling to get up in the mornings and feel extremely sluggish and almost hungover. Feeling like this the next day is not worth it for me, so I'm going to stop using this product.
customer_reviews.author: saucytemptress

customer_reviews.title: works well- as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This supplement has definitely boosted my energy, and seems to have a gentle calming effect. I will continue to use it as natural alternative for relaxation and mood enhancement.
customer_reviews.author: Karen in Illinois

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Very skeptical at first, I have been experiencing severe anxiety recently over the last month and could not calm down, I have had panic attacks for years and would take a low dose .05 of Xanax for relief as needed, however this did nothing for my anxiety. I got this product last week started taking on Thursday it takes a few days but as of today Monday 8/28/2017 I actually feel it working will continue to take 2 pills in the morning and keeping fingers crossed it continues to work.
customer_reviews.author: BelltownK

customer_reviews.title: I have anxiety and often times get bad headaches from the anxiety and nervousness
customer_reviews.text: I think they're OK and work somewhat but it's definitely not a miracle product . I have anxiety and often times get bad headaches from the anxiety and nervousness. I take to a day one in the morning and one before bed and like I said they seem to work a little bit but I had them put to the test on a day that I had to show up for court for A divorce proceeding. That day I was nervous and of course having some anxiety so I took two of the capsules and I have to say it really didn't do much in that instance. I'm not sure at this point if I'll re-order.
customer_reviews.author: lisa gaeta

customer_reviews.title: I feel more alive than ever!
customer_reviews.text: Having PTSD this product has given me a chance to work through stress or anxiety much easier. It has given me energy throughout the day since I have quit drinking tea and coffee and I sleep great at night. Highly recommend this product if you are looking for a natural way to work through stress and anxiety without prescription medications.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love these. I've tried them a few times and ...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these. I've tried them a few times and they've done nothing for me. I really wanted to finish the entire bottle before leaving a review. But they've been so ineffective I don't even think I'll finish the bottle. Definitely a waste of 20 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Alana D

customer_reviews.title: Great Supplement for Decreasing Stress and Cortisol Levels
customer_reviews.text: It works waaaaaay better than I initially expected. Must be the high dosage of Ashwagandha that makes this product so effective, as most of the other competitors use a much lower dosage. Its a great stress reliever which should help with decreasing cortisol levels. Overall, I totally recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: LuisG

customer_reviews.title: No change 😢
customer_reviews.text: I SO wanted this to work, to at least help me not feel like I either wanted to bawl or bite someones head off. I’ve been on anti-depressants but can’t handle the weight gain or the zombie like feeling. I gave them 3 weeks to get in my system, but honestly feel no difference. I am happy they work for others, but they don’t for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy J. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: I suffer with really bad anxiety/depression. I still take anxiety medication
customer_reviews.text: I suffer with really bad anxiety/depression. I still take anxiety medication, but I didn't feel like it was enough. This isn't a "miracle pill", but I did notice a slight change. It doesn't make you feel like anything, it's basically just getting your chemicals in your body back on track. I notice that I'm not as *on edge* & I have a little bit more energy. But like I said, keep in mind, this is not a Xanex; I'd say this helped me 15% --- but 15% is better than nothing :)
customer_reviews.author: angela gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Don't be hopeful in this product.
customer_reviews.text: This may help people that don't really have anxiety or have extremely mild discomfort. If you truly suffer from anxiety this is completely useless. You may feel a little calmer for a couple seconds but it does nothing to actually ease symptoms of panic or even nervousness. I was so hopeful and happy when I bought this and it was a let down. I hope I can help someone else to not feel let down and disappointed when they're already in a low place.
customer_reviews.author: Nic Thibodeaux

customer_reviews.title: definitely not placebo effect
customer_reviews.text: because, for me, there's a physical sensation that comes along with it. it makes me feel like i just had one puff of weed. not high exactly, just that level of relaxed. i felt it immediately, though people say it takes weeks...so now instead of the two i take one. my anxiety has been cut almost completely. i'd say give it a try. it's too cheap not to.
customer_reviews.author: shamsi ruhe

customer_reviews.title: Nice to feel normal.
customer_reviews.text: I started taking this as a last resort before speaking to my doctor about my increasing anxiety. Needless to say, I never had to have the conversation because this worked so well. I am no longer in a mode of constant flight or fight. This has helped a lot helping me to ignore the little stressors in my life and better handle the large ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I feel human again.  I'm also capable of focus without stress! (Once again)
customer_reviews.text: Hi Benjamin, I absolutely love your ashwagandha. I've just been through a transoceanic move and some major life changes - talk about potentially stressful! Anyway, I've been loading on ashwagandha for the last two weeks and am finding I'm less strung out and my focus is getting pretty hot. Thank goodness, I feel human again LOL Recommend this brand. Usually I buy bulk ashwagandha and load my own capsules or I'll make up a paste. Seeing as nobody got time fer dat these days, Lake Havasu nutrition is an excellent go to. Appreciate that you have reached out!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Dog

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help with my anxiety and stress which I have long suffered from its damaging effects. Rather than using what the doctors usually give, which generally cause undesirable side effects, I wanted to give this product a chance. So far, so good as I am calmer and my blood pressure has improved. My fiance says he noticed a change too, he says I don't appear as stressed. So I will keep taking this long as it helps.
customer_reviews.author: D&S

customer_reviews.title: Extremely helpful for anxiety!
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love these!! I suffer from sever anxiety and panic attacks. These pills help me feel more peaceful everyday. They also give me a great amount of energy, not a jittery kind, but alike I'm super motivated all day. Great product! Will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsi Park

customer_reviews.title: Less Likely to go NUTS!
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking Ashwagandha for the past 2 weeks and I have to say it is amazing! I find that I no longer get so anxious and flustered like before. I used to stress about everything, but it keeps me leveled. I take 2 pills with breakfast and they help me deal with the many annoying people I come in contact with daily. I still have a bit of road rage, but it's not as bad. I do notice a difference when I forget to take it. (I need a pill for forgetfulness too!) also, I pee a bit more, but I'm not sure if that's because of the pills. Just noticing.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Gauthier

customer_reviews.title: Overall Happy Buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Ashwagandha to boost up my immune system and reduce inflammation that I'm combating due to a leaky gut. I take two capsules every morning and I feel like its helping me recover. Before purchasing from Havasu I used to take a powder form in a morning shake but the capsules are much more convenient when you are on the go and/or if you aren't fond of its bitter like earthy taste. I definitely recommend this brand of Ashwagandha for anyone trying to boost up their immune system.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Pretty skeptical to try this but it had good reviews and it’s decently priced so I figured it was worth a shot. After a few days I decided that I wasted my money because I felt completely normal. That’s when it hit me, I felt normal, I didn’t have any more anxiety. This has been a game changer for me. Sure it might be a placebo affect, who knows, but this stuff works for me. I’m a huge fan. I totally recommend and I will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: What I will say that is that both myself and a family member have used this product with noticeable benefits when it comes to addressing anxiety in particular. I find that what it helps me with is handling situations that used to kick in the fight or flight response. Things that are not that big of a deal but used to irrationally cause an increase in my stress and anxiety are significantly easier to push my way through when actively using Ashwagandha. Very pleased. (I've used it for more than a year, taking a month every three months).
customer_reviews.author: Andrew James Shields

customer_reviews.title: my good humor has increased as well as helped me to ...
customer_reviews.text: Since I have started to take this complement, my good humor has increased as well as helped me to sleep better. I am looking forward to finish my first bottle and start the second one. Until now I have no complaints about the company or the product! I want to try more of their vitamines and enjoy other promotions they have available.
customer_reviews.author: MDDM

customer_reviews.title: What a relief!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not gonna lie, I didn’t have much hope for these. I don’t like prescription medication because I’ve seen what it’s done to people around me. Thought I’d give these a shot and man am I glad I did! It takes about a week to notice the difference at least for me it did and when situations came up where I would usually have anxiety, there was nothing. No butterflies or feeling of throwing up. I’ve been in great moods and even my family have noticed the subtle difference.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Nice supplement for bringing on the calm
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to take daily to help with some of the stress of grad school and to improve my mood in a subtle way. After trying L-Theanine for a few weeks, I was disappointed by its performance and stopped taking it. Browsing through Amazon, I noticed this product, its ratings and heard about Ashwagandha, so purchasing seemed like a no-brainer. I have noticed subtle effects of taking just one capsule per day. Sometimes I take 2 capsules (the required dosage) if I know ahead of time that I'm going to have a rather busy and involved day. I feel a bit calmer, more relaxed, and less tense with this supplement. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Ocanas

customer_reviews.title: Great for Stress and Anxiety
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It has minimized my anxiety and stress ten fold. I can handle a day without feeling the overwhelming anxiety for things and can focus better on my tasks without getting stressed out. I can clearly look at deadlines without feeling stressed for no reason. I will continue to use this product!
customer_reviews.author: Aryn Schunzel

customer_reviews.title: I haven't yet finished a bottle but I feel like this product helps with stress
customer_reviews.text: I often get moody and have taken meds for depression since I was a preteen for it but in my 20s Iv wanted a more natural path. I haven't yet finished a bottle but I feel like this product helps with stress. ITS certainly not a magic pill but it helps me get a great night sleep (I still use melatonin) and yes I do need to give myself a few extra minutes to get up in the morning which is fine. I'm interested to see if I notice a difference when using this product longer. I'll be reordering because I do believe it helps
customer_reviews.author: Rebekahrmo14

customer_reviews.title: I rely on these!
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking these for 6 months now. I suffer with general anxiety and I also become highly overwhelmed and stressed out with PMS. These capsules have helped me tremendously! After 2 months of taking them I ran out and didn’t rush to get a new bottle so went about 3 weeks without them and I noticed that I my stress level and anxiety felt intensified. Then realized it was because I hadn't been taking the Ashwagandha. I’ve even noticed my blood pressure has gone down at my last few Dr. Appointments. Love this stuff and I hope they will continue to sell them! Please try these if you are hesitant and give it at least a month!
customer_reviews.author: Amiee Donahue

customer_reviews.title: I can feel the anxiety going away
customer_reviews.text: I had decided I wanted a more natural approach in dealing with anxiety and depression instead of taking meds that doctors always wanna prescribe. It's only been about a week but I can at least feel my anxiety going away (feeling less heart flutters).
customer_reviews.author: Chelle

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after reading some reviews that had similar pains as myself. I found that within 2 days or so of taking, the main pain of late abated in a big way. A muscle across my scapula in my back is like a fist jammed in a area. On these, it dulls to almost nil not quite all gone.(2 a day) I'm continuing on as I believe these benefit in many areas of our bodies,as well as emotions.
customer_reviews.author: JlA

customer_reviews.title: Didn't help
customer_reviews.text: I've taken 2 of these every day for a month now. They didn't do anything for my anxiety at all. No difference. So zero stars for that, however I am adding a star because, and I'm being completely serious, I have been more regular going to the bathroom. I haven't made any changes to diet or anything so the only thing I can attribute it to is these pills.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I started taking this a few days ago and both of us have noticed a difference. without going into much detail, ive noticed it helps me correct my hormonal imbalance and the back pain that is caused as a result of the hormonal imbalance is significantly reduced. My husband has felt less anxiety and her feels he's more energetic after taking this. We love it and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Divtag

customer_reviews.title: My solace
customer_reviews.text: As a Clinical Psychotherapist, I continue to seek more natural/herbal remedies/aides for my patients and myself. Also in doing so I have sought a remedy or aide in allowing me to sleep at night.....i have years ago, developed anxiety at bedtime and a continuous flow of thoughts That deter my ability to relax and sleep....this product allows me to relax and sleep. Now in saying it helps me doesn't mean it's best for everyone, but definitely worth a try. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: This brand of ashwagandha was recommended by my functional medicine doctor. I am getting ready to order my third bottle. I take 2 in the morning and 1 in the evening in conjunction with other herbs and natural remedies. I even gave my teenager one pill in the morning and one in the evening when he was under extra stress and it seemed to help. Overall, It seems to be working just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: A wonder for stress & anxiety
customer_reviews.text: This product is truly a wonder I have mild anxiety and stress and I started taking these after work, it has helped me unwind after work. I also got these for my friend who gets really nervous and anxious at work, it has tremendously calmed her nerves. Will definitely be going on a subscription.
customer_reviews.author: kahikilani

customer_reviews.title: Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: I struggle on a daily basis with anxiety and trouble focusing. This med helps me with both. I took it for the first time yesterday and started working. After a few hours I realized that I had been relaxed for hours and able to focus on what I was doing. If you are looking for an alternative, I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: karenL

customer_reviews.title: Feel better, I wish I had known about Ashwagandha years sooner.
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking Ashwagandha for about 4 months now. I didn't notice a difference at first but I do now. I seem to have a little more energy. I have several autoimmune diseases and this was recommended to me for autoimmune. I had never heard of it but sure wish I had heard of it years ago. It has made a big difference in the way I feel. I will continue taking this product.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki B.

customer_reviews.title: Capsules large for me
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with product but can’t swallow the capsules so switched to powder
customer_reviews.author: Diana Jones

customer_reviews.title: Takes a few days, but it definitely works to help alleviate stressful moods!
customer_reviews.text: After reading tons of the reviews about this product, and others that claim "stress relief", I decided to give this product a try. I am VERY glad I did. Although the change in mood and feeling didn't happen right away (it took me a few days of consistent use to notice a difference, it did help with my stress at work and busy life. I haven't felt or noticed any bad side effects whatsoever, so I am very glad that I found something that I feel is safe and effective. I will DEFINITELY continue to use this product ongoing. If you are on the fence about it, I suggest giving it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Energy but no sleep
customer_reviews.text: I thought this might help with my Insomnia. It has the reverse effect on me. For someone who needs more energy it would probably work fine. The price, container, and ease of use was great
customer_reviews.author: muzikluvr

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for a natural solution to ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this for about a week and a half. I am already feeling the benefits, including stress reduction, an overall feeling of calmness and my anxiety levels are decreasing even as my doctor has been reducing the dosage of the anti anxiety medication I have been taking for about 15 years. I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for a natural solution to stress and anxiety issues.
customer_reviews.author: G. Adkins

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Brand - Life saver
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this particular brand for about a week now. I absolutely love that you can actually notice a change day to day. The longer you take it the better you feel. I ultimately was able to get off my horrible antidepressant, lose 30 lbs and change my view point on life. I do credit half of that to this stuff. Don't think twice, buy it and try it for a week. You WILL notice a change. Thank you Havasu Nutrition for giving me my life back!
customer_reviews.author: M T W

customer_reviews.title: phenomenal for relieving problems from calcium channel blockers
customer_reviews.text: After coming off BP meds, I experienced terrible side effect of central nervous system. I could feel every heart beat and my blood pumping through different parts of my body for months. This was a constant experience which makes life quite difficult and triggers bad anxiety. One week after ashwagandha, it's 10% of what it was and nerve pain in feet is about a third of what it had been. Only side effect that I have noticed is vivid dreams every night when I rarely dreamed before.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Salsman

customer_reviews.title: Spacey
customer_reviews.text: Kind of makes me feel floaty, not in a bad way. If you haven’t eaten much or need to focus don’t take because you will fee spacey, but everyone is different. That was my experience
customer_reviews.author: Benito Rumbo

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: These made me feel kind of buzzed and a little anxious. Did not make me sleepy at all. I didn't care for the effect but they seem to work well for other people.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Anders

customer_reviews.title: Isn't working
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife as she has Anxiety and panic attacks, she tried it for 2 weeks and informed me it was a waste of money. My daughter tried it as she has Anxiety, didn't do much for her either.
customer_reviews.author: Sean M Ireland

customer_reviews.title: Great for midlife crisis emotions
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I was experiencing a bit of a midlife crisis. Everything in life if falling apart including my body. Within a week of taking this I didn't have that drudging through life emition. Life is still falling apart, however now I am more able to handle it emotionally.
customer_reviews.author: STUBBS

customer_reviews.title: Just feel better
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to me by a friend from yoga class that I know researches everything. However I was a bit skeptical at first but it really seems to help me with my stress especially at work. And over all it keeps things along on a daily basis if you know what I mean.
customer_reviews.author: MaggieMae

customer_reviews.title: So calming!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! I've been taking the supplement for a couple of weeks now and I can really feel the benefits. I take 1 pill a day, just after breakfast, and within minutes I can feel a wave of 'calm.' It really helps to get me through my stressful workday. I highly recommend it if you're looking for something non-prescription to help with stress and anxiety.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Curtis

customer_reviews.title: These really work 💞
customer_reviews.text: These really help my stress level, I'm going through the lovely change of life and lots of times my nerves are a mess and everything drives me crazy. I feel more calm and not as overwhelmed with this product. I haven't expirienced any side effects either. I definetly can tell in my mood when I forget to take these in the morning 💗 love the product
customer_reviews.author: Tina Zuniga

customer_reviews.title: it helps me sleep better, and hopefully
customer_reviews.text: I can not believe how much this helps with the stress of my custody battle. I don’t think I could get through it without Ashwaghanda. The makes such a difference in my energy level, my mental clarity, it helps me sleep better, and hopefully, will help with my weight gain due to high cortisol levels. I have adrenal gland burnout symptoms and this definitely helps me!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I can tell an amazing difference in my everyday stress level as well as motivation and energy. I highly suggest these supplements instead of resorting to actual stress or anxiety meds. You can never go wrong with natural products. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Pratt

customer_reviews.title: They Don't Know What They're Selling
customer_reviews.text: I didn't feel relief with this at all. So, I wondered which type of Ashwagandha this was, KSM-66 or Sensoril. They told me they didn't know and would ask and probably get back to me. Well, they never did. I'll buy it somewhere else where they actually know what they're offering.
customer_reviews.author: Ridvan

customer_reviews.title: This is a tentative review... using this ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a tentative review...using this product to reduce cortisol levels as part of a protocol to heal adrenal fatigue. I think it has helped produce a calming effect. No word yet on long term adrenal fatigue healing benefits, but I'll update!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: This has definitely helped with stress and anxiety as well as bloating. I love the fact that it helps protect the liver as well. I use it daily with neuroIGNITE and have experienced very positive results. Would highly recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Trippett

customer_reviews.title: Clearer Thinking
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this product for about 2 years. I recently ran out for about a week and noticed a definite difference in my "thinking" process. It relieves my "foggy head" and makes everyday processing much clearer - at least for me! I have recommended this product to many of my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Omaof131993

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic product! I've used other brand's of ashwaganda and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product! I've used other brand's of ashwaganda and they simply don't compare. This is a high quality supplement that works wonders on stress and other stress related ailments. I highly recommend this product. I look forward to trying their other herbs and supplements in the future! This company clearly loves it's customers and this customer, clearly loves this company!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Slightly decreased my anxiety...
customer_reviews.text: I have taken this everyday since April 23rd and started noticing a slight difference in my anxiety after a few weeks. I say slight because I still get anxious, just not as much as before. I choose to work with products that are natural to keep from having so many side-effects. I gave 4 stars only because it causes me to have some digestive problems (gas).
customer_reviews.author: MuscleMind

customer_reviews.title: Seems to help
customer_reviews.text: I definitely notice a kind of calm about 30 min after taking them. They don’t make me sleepy so I appreciate that, just not so much anxiety anymore. I gave 4 starts because I feel like it’s a subtle difference, not as profound as I was hoping but definitely makes a difference so I’m probably gonna get them again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: No effect whatsoever
customer_reviews.text: This did not work for me. I rated it 2 stars only because it did not cause any adverse side effects on me like it did on others. I definitely think it is a placebo and for the price I expected SOME kind of effect on my mild stress but unfortunately it did nothing for me.
customer_reviews.author: AYC23

customer_reviews.title: And I have slept better at night which I have not been able to ...
customer_reviews.text: Only taken it a few days but I noticed right away the difference. Definitely feel more calm without being tired or sluggish. And I have slept better at night which I have not been able to do since going off prescription ssri medication.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Seems to help me with stress/anxiety.
customer_reviews.text: The Ashwagandha seems to help me with stress/anxiety. I did a little experimenting before finding a solution of combining my medication with Ashwagandha since the both combined made me a bit sleepy during the day. This might be great for some people, but I'm a high energy person that requires the adrenaline to get it all done. I now take one capsule at night which seems to help in the sleep department. I also noticed after a week that I'm a bit more laid back during the day, although I cannot say just yet for sure it's the Ashwagandha. I'll try to re-post another review in a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Veltre

customer_reviews.title: Good Supplement
customer_reviews.text: I started taking this supplement to help me reduce my dose on my depression meds. It has been helping me maintain a more calm and relaxed state, rather than being an emotional mess. My goal is to get off my depression meds completely so I will be reordering.
customer_reviews.author: JCS

customer_reviews.title: Gives me more energy
customer_reviews.text: I find ashwaganda gives me more energy when I take two capsules in the morning. Sometimes the taste repeats on me and then I have coffee to cover the taste. I have been using ashwaganda for about 6 months now and I find it works great.
customer_reviews.author: savvyshopper

customer_reviews.title: Really Seems to Help
customer_reviews.text: Update - I've been taking this for about 3 months now and still highly recommend it. I am really happy with this product. I didn't realize how stressed out I actually got until I started taking it and just wasn't. Things that normally make me anxious and upset during my normal day, just don't. I'm able to think clearly about the situation or event and respond without the cloudiness of anxiety.
customer_reviews.author: Donna H

customer_reviews.title: Really helps my stress anxiety
customer_reviews.text: This really worked for me. My sister recommended I try ashwagandha for my stress and anxiety. I went on amazon and chose this one. I noticed a difference right away! I missed one day taking it and felt not as calm. That's how I know it's working. I see other reviews say it helps them sleep, however I take it in the morning to deal with the day and it does not make me feel tired. I love it! Great natural alternative!
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Stress and anxiety relief
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best addition to my morning routine. I struggle with a lot of stress and anxiety day to day and have been pleasantly surprised with how much these Ashwagandha capsules have helped. I feel more able to focus on my day to day to tasks without worrying and feeling overwhelmed constantly! So happy to have discovered this herb.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Garcia

customer_reviews.title: works wonderful at keeping me happy
customer_reviews.text: This is my magic pill. Due to some unfortunate events in my life, I was living through very stressful days. I decided to give this a try since it's seemed harmless ., and from the first one I took, I could feel my mood elevating and I started to feel better just after 30 mins of taking this. I take it almost everyday now, it is helping me by keeping lucid, energized, and most importantly positive :)
customer_reviews.author: Nevy Bebedjian

product_meta.title: Havasu Nutrition Ashwagandha Capsules with Adaptogens, for Stress Relief, Anxiety Relief, Mood Support, Libido Boost, and Adrenal Fatigue Relief; Non-GMO 1000 mg; 90 Capsules for Men & Women
feature_bullets: PREMIUM ANXIETY SUPPLEMENT. Ashwagandha is well know for its stress-lowering effects. Our ashwagandha formula aids in anxiety relief for adults by lowering cortisol levels.* Ashwagandha root acts as natural cortisol blocker for women and men.*

ENERGY AND MOOD BOOST. Are you feeling cranky, fatigued, or struggling with a sad mood? Our Ashwagandha extract can help you fight it!* Ashwagandha is an adaptogen that acts as a natural stress and energy supplement for women and men with fatigue.* Feel your mood take a 360 in a positive way today!

ARTICHOKE EXTRACT FOR BETTER ABSORPTION. At Havasu Nutrition, we pride ourselved in making sure that our products are of the highest quality with the most transparency to you! We packed our Ashwagandha capsules with artichoke extract, as a concentrated form of artichoke, to help act as a digestive aid and promote absorption so that you get the results you want faster than the competition.*

LIBIDO ENHANCER FOR WOMEN & MEN. Studies show that chronic stress can raise cortisol levels, which may lower your libido. Ashwagandha acts as a natural stress relief supplement, and men and womens libido booster, by helping you manage your stress.*

ASHWAGANDHA AND SEXUAL HEALTH. Studies show that Ashwagandha supplements can rebalance several hormones and support the thyroid, an extremely important regulatory organ in our bodies. Our Ashwagandha capsules may increase sexual performance and boost testosterone levels in stressed individuals.*
